Hester Prynne's Daughter was creepy

by Stacey Mantooth

28 Aug 2013

$count = 0;
while (<stdin>) {
    @w = split;
    $count++;
    for ($i=0; $i<=$#w; $i++) {
    $s[$i] += $w[$i];
    }
}

for ($i=0; $i<=$#w; $i++) {
    print $s[$i]/$count, "\t";
}

print "\n";
Llamas graze steep slopes, all lulled, sun-warmed and drowsy, wind ruffling coats. Stacey likes short poems and Peruvian quadrupeds. Find Stacey Mantooth on Twitter, Github, and on the web.
